title: 91.0.1 sürümünden itibaren sorunlar var
content:
Merhabalar,

91.0.1 sürümünden itibaren ciddi sorunlar var. Örneğin herhangi bir indirme başlatılıyor ama sonlandırılamıyor.

Aşağıdaki gibi web sitelerine girdiğinizde resimlerin bulunmadığı sadece linklerin yeraldığı html görüntüsüyle karşılaşılıyor (diğer tarayıcılarda aynı sayfalar açılıyor) https://www.haber7.com/ https://www.milliyet.com.tr/

bazılarında ise sertifika sorunu ekranı ile karşılaşılıyor. Bir de güvenlik sorunu yaşananlar var. https://www.star.com.tr/

Yukarıdaki sorunu kayıtlı yerimlerimin çoğunda yaşıyorum. Bizi Chrome a mahkum etmeyeceğinizi ümit ediyorum.
creator: m_okay

title: I HATE the changes to search facility !
content:
Forever you've been apply to type anything into the Google search bar on the home screen, but not anymore.

Now whateveryou type automatically appear up in the tab line with https// infront of it , then of course it comes back with ...cannot find that web address !!

I'm not looking for a web address, i'm searching a subject matter..

This change is SO annoying I'm now seriously thinking of dumping my much loved Firefox for something which works better.

Why isn't there the 'option' to do search without it 'assuming' you're looking for a web address ?


So Annoying and frustrating, whoever dreamt this idea up....?
creator: jacksonp

title: fail to play music
content:
on manjaro i3wm, firefox91 can not play music and no voice when play video. but chromium can. the output message on terminal is:

$firefox [Child 60021, MediaDecoderStateMachine #1] WARNING: 7fd242a17ac0 OpenCubeb() failed to init cubeb: file /build/firefox/src/firefox-91.0.2/dom/media/AudioStream.cpp:324 [Child 60021, MediaDecoderStateMachine #1] WARNING: Decoder=7fd247667c00 [OnMediaSinkAudioError]: file /build/firefox/src/firefox-91.0.2/dom/media/MediaDecoderStateMachine.cpp:3980 [Child 60021, MediaDecoderStateMachine #1] WARNING: Decoder=7fd247667c00 Decode error: NS_ERROR_DOM_MEDIA_MEDIASINK_ERR (0x806e000b) - OnMediaSinkAudioError: file /build/firefox/src/firefox-91.0.2/dom/media/MediaDecoderStateMachine.cpp:3541
creator: nyliubing

title: kvalificirano potrdilo
content:
Pozdavljeni,

s posodobitvijo Mozille s kvalificiranim potrdilom ni vem možno dostopati do nekaterih spletnih strani. eDavki, zVem ...

Vedno javi naslednje; Napaka: Digitalno potrdilo ni na voljo oz. ni primerno! Digitalno potrdilo, ki ste ga uporabili za prijavo, ne ustreza politiki, ki jo je določil ponudnik storitve. Error ID: (1630994186212)

Prosim za pomoč.

Lp, Nina
creator: nina.kadunc

title: need to download older version of Firefox for Mac
content: , Previously told that version 78.0.1 esr should work with Mac 10.11.6, found the system listing but there are many, many abreviations listed. No idea which I need. Is there any way out of this?
creator: bermudabob

title: Restore previous email layout
content: Firefox just updated. I went to check my email and the layout was totally different and all the messages that were in my inbox and junk folder were gone!!! As a matter of fact, ALL of my saved emails and folders are gone!!! Where did they go? How do I get them back? How do I restore the previous Outlook view? It seems as if every time I get used to a layout you change it. This is a crock!!! I save things, such as emails that are important, and I place them in folders that I have created, so I know where they are and you guys just change it and throw away my folders? How do I go back to the previous version of Firefox? Or, how do I go back to the previous version of outlook so I can get my folders, saved emails, as well as my inbox back? If you are going to do this type of thing then give us the option of retaining our emails and the look and feel that we are used to. Some of us have trouble remembering things and change is difficult!!!!
creator: kjayhouse15

title: unlocking protecting for insecure connection
content:
I have been trying to unlock the security setting preventing me from accessing my work hub link. I know it's secure, it's literally my job's website portal for a Healthcare network. I used to be able to access it no problem but all of a sudden Firefox is preventing me from accessing it without an option to disable protection when I click on more info like I usually can on browsers.

This is the link: http://myapps.microsoft.com/
creator: stran858

title: full screen stuck in full screen
content: why does my firefox browser 91.0.2 stay in full screen when i go into full screen. I can't get out of full screen. I used the windows key to try to close firefox but it doesn't work either. I have to force shutdown laptop to get out of full screen by shutting down pc. How can I fix this problem?? Thank you in advance.
creator: janbrayshaw

title: can't use new version of Firefox.
content: Kept seeing notices that my version of firefox was obsolete, so downloaded new version. Now, notices say I cant use new version because I need Mac 10.12 and I have only 10.11.6. Why did it download? How doI fix this? Can I back up to old version? Might be able to go to 10.12, but that might be messy.
creator: bermudabob
